Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP14.server.controller

Class ClientConnection

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP14.server.controller.ClientConnection
Direct Known Subclasses:
TCPClientConnection
public abstract class ClientConnection
extends java.lang.Object
Generic connection to a client. Exposes the functions for bidirectional communication with a client.
